name: Bad Minesweeper (Bear)
description:
A bad version of minesweeper that was made in about 2 days because my teacher said we were only allowed to play minesweeper if we were making it.

We referring to me and my classmate.

See theirs here: https://mike-sdg22a.itch.io/minesweeper

Includes: 40 bombs

first tile will never be a bomb (Does not open a big area tho)
